column1: Perote is a city and municipality in the Mexican state of Veracruz. It serves as the seat of government for the surrounding municipality of the same name

column4: and the state of Puebla. It is on Federal Highway 140.

column1: Its climate is cold and dry with an annual average temperature of 12 degrees Celsius.
Perote's fortress of San Carlos once served as a prison. Guadalupe Victoria died there.
Also in Perote is the Cofre de Perote shield-shaped volcano (the Nahuatl name of which was "Naucampatepetl
This town is the home of a sizable Spanish community which immigrated here in the 1930s.  Because of this
column2: it is known for Spanish-style cured meats and sausage such as jamón serrano (serrano ham)
